text:
Police in Huntington Beach, California, asked hundreds of demonstrators protesting George Floyd's death to leave.

A month ago in the same city, a protest against an order to close all beaches to prevent the spread of Covid-19 was left mostly alone. https://t.co/PLsM9oQpIr
